attributes.additional_details:
This petition is to ask the Government to allow the UK the home of the commonwealth to celebrate from here on in Her Majesty's commitment and work on behalf of us and the commonwealth.

I believe no matter your background we the Uk should especially hold Her Majesty's annual return with upmost respect and show our love and respect to our dear Elizebeth. This could be done with an annual concert and local celebration for all UK nationalist and Monarchist.

I say this as a proud Scot that believes in our place in the UK and feels a pro Monarchist and believes in their unabated future at the heart of the UK and our Commonwealth Partners
